stories.title: Project initialization
stories.description: Set up Next.js 16 project with TypeScript, Tailwind v4, shadcn/ui, Biome, and SQLite database for a solo agency prospect management and lead generation system
acceptance: Next.js 16 app created using: bunx create-next-app@latest app --ts --tailwind --eslint --app --src-dir --use-bun --yes
Biome setup: cd app && bun add -d @biomejs/biome && bunx @biomejs/biome init
Tailwind v4 configured with CSS-first configuration
shadcn/ui initialized with bunx shadcn@latest init using New York style and neutral base color
better-sqlite3 installed and database connection utility created
Database schema defined with tables: prospects, outreach_campaigns, touchpoints, deals, services, portfolio_items
Global CSS includes prefers-color-scheme media queries for automatic light/dark mode
Typography scale uses clamp() for fluid sizing with professional, clean sans-serif font
Base layout is responsive with mobile-first approach for on-the-go prospecting
Environment variables configured for API integrations (LinkedIn, email, calendar)

stories.title: Ideal Client Profile (ICP) builder
stories.description: Define and manage ideal client profiles to focus prospecting efforts on high-value targets for UI/UX and front-end development services
acceptance: ICP creation form with fields: industry vertical, company size, tech stack indicators, pain points, budget range
Multiple ICP templates saved for different service offerings (UI design, React development, design systems, etc.)
Scoring rubric auto-calculates prospect fit based on ICP match (1-100 score)
ICP includes trigger events: funding rounds, job postings for designers/developers, tech stack migrations
Visual ICP card displays key characteristics at a glance
API route: GET/POST/PUT/DELETE /api/icp for CRUD operations
Default ICPs seeded for common front-end agency targets: SaaS startups, e-commerce, fintech, healthtech
ICP exports as shareable template for refinement

stories.title: Prospect discovery and research hub
stories.description: Centralized interface for discovering and researching potential clients through multiple channels and data sources
acceptance: LinkedIn Sales Navigator integration for lead search and import (manual CSV fallback)
Prospect card displays: company name, website, key contacts, tech stack, recent news, ICP score
Website analyzer extracts tech stack indicators (React, Vue, Angular, legacy jQuery, etc.)
Job board scanner flags companies hiring front-end developers or designers (opportunity signal)
Funding news integration (Crunchbase/manual entry) tracks recent investment rounds
Prospect notes field with rich text for research insights
Tags system for categorizing prospects: hot lead, warm, cold, nurture, lost
Bulk import from CSV with field mapping for migration from spreadsheets
API routes: GET /api/prospects, POST /api/prospects, GET /api/prospects/:id/analyze

stories.title: Multi-channel outreach sequence builder
stories.description: Design and execute personalized outreach sequences across email, LinkedIn, and other channels with proven templates for agency services
acceptance: Visual sequence builder with drag-drop steps: email, LinkedIn message, LinkedIn connection, follow-up, call
Template library with proven cold email frameworks: AIDA, PAS, BAB, value-first approach
Personalization tokens: {{firstName}}, {{company}}, {{techStack}}, {{painPoint}}, {{recentNews}}
Portfolio showcase integration embeds relevant case studies based on prospect industry
Delay configuration between steps (1 day, 3 days, 1 week, custom)
A/B test variants for subject lines and opening hooks
Sequence analytics: open rates, reply rates, meeting booked rates per template
Auto-pause sequence on prospect reply (positive or negative)
Pre-built sequences for: cold outreach, warm referral follow-up, inbound lead nurture, re-engagement

stories.title: Touchpoint and interaction timeline
stories.description: Track every interaction with prospects across all channels to maintain context and build relationships over time
acceptance: Timeline view shows chronological history of all touchpoints per prospect
Touchpoint types: email sent, email opened, reply received, LinkedIn message, call, meeting, referral
Quick-add touchpoint with voice memo transcription for mobile logging
Automatic email tracking integration logs opens and clicks
Meeting notes template with structured fields: discussed, next steps, objections, timeline
Reminder system for follow-up actions with push notifications
Relationship strength indicator based on touchpoint frequency and recency
API routes: GET/POST /api/prospects/:id/touchpoints

stories.title: Dynamic portfolio case study manager
stories.description: Manage and selectively share portfolio items and case studies tailored to prospect industry and needs
acceptance: Case study builder with fields: client name, industry, challenge, solution, tech stack used, results/metrics
Before/after screenshot uploads with annotation tools
Video testimonial embedding (Loom, YouTube)
Industry tags for automatic matching to prospect profiles
Service tags: UI design, UX research, React development, design system, animation, accessibility
Public shareable link with custom slug for each case study
Portfolio mini-site generator with selected case studies for specific prospects
Analytics tracking: views, time on page, clicks per case study link
NDA toggle hides client names while showcasing work

stories.title: Visual deal pipeline and forecasting
stories.description: Kanban-style pipeline to track deals from initial contact through closed-won with revenue forecasting
acceptance: Drag-drop kanban board with stages: Lead, Qualified, Proposal, Negotiation, Closed-Won, Closed-Lost
Deal card shows: company, contact, deal value, probability, expected close date, days in stage
Stage-specific fields: qualification criteria for Qualified, proposal link for Proposal stage
Deal value and probability auto-calculate weighted pipeline value
Stale deal alerts when no activity for configurable period (default 14 days)
Win/loss analysis prompts capture reasons on deal close
Monthly and quarterly pipeline reports with conversion metrics
Deal velocity metrics: average time in each stage, overall sales cycle length
API routes: GET/POST/PUT /api/deals, GET /api/deals/pipeline-stats

stories.title: Smart proposal and estimate generator
stories.description: Quickly generate professional proposals with service packages, pricing, and timeline estimates tailored to front-end development projects
acceptance: Service catalog with pre-defined offerings: UI audit, design system, React development, component library, etc.
Pricing models: fixed project, hourly retainer, value-based tiers
Proposal template with sections: understanding, approach, deliverables, timeline, investment, about me
Auto-populate prospect details and relevant case studies from CRM data
Interactive pricing table with optional add-ons
E-signature integration (DocuSign/manual) for acceptance
Proposal analytics: opened, time spent viewing, sections viewed
Version history tracks proposal revisions
PDF export with professional branding

stories.title: Authority content calendar and tracker
stories.description: Plan and track thought leadership content that attracts inbound leads and establishes expertise in UI/UX and front-end development
acceptance: Content calendar with week/month views for planning posts across channels
Content types: LinkedIn post, Twitter thread, blog article, case study, newsletter, video
Topic idea bank categorized by pillar: UI trends, React best practices, design systems, accessibility
Content performance tracking: impressions, engagement, inbound inquiries attributed
Repurposing workflow: blog to LinkedIn to Twitter thread pipeline
Posting schedule optimizer suggests best times based on historical engagement
Draft status tracking: idea, outline, draft, review, scheduled, published
Hashtag and topic tag suggestions for discoverability
Integration hooks for Buffer/Typefully/manual posting

stories.title: Referral partner network manager
stories.description: Track and nurture referral relationships with complementary service providers who can send qualified leads
acceptance: Partner profiles: name, company, services offered, referral agreement terms
Partner categories: backend developers, branding agencies, marketing agencies, product managers
Referral tracking: referred by, referred to, outcome, commission if applicable
Partner touchpoint reminders to maintain relationships (coffee chats, check-ins)
Two-way referral history shows given and received referrals
Partner satisfaction notes and fit scoring
Warm intro request templates for asking partners to connect you with prospects
Annual referral revenue report by partner
Partner appreciation tracking (gifts, thank you notes, reciprocal referrals)

stories.title: Daily prospecting routine dashboard
stories.description: Gamified daily dashboard that guides solo operators through consistent prospecting activities with clear metrics
acceptance: Daily activity goals: 10 new prospects researched, 15 personalized outreaches sent, 5 follow-ups
Progress rings show completion percentage for each activity type
Today's focus queue surfaces highest priority actions: hot leads, stale deals, scheduled follow-ups
Quick action buttons for common tasks: log call, send follow-up, add prospect
Streak counter for consecutive prospecting days with milestone celebrations
Weekly scorecard shows: new prospects, outreach volume, replies received, meetings booked, proposals sent
Time blocking suggestions based on prospect response patterns
Morning briefing email summarizes today's priorities
End-of-day reflection prompt captures wins and learnings

stories.title: Conversion analytics and insights
stories.description: Comprehensive analytics to understand what's working in prospecting efforts and optimize for higher conversion
acceptance: Funnel visualization: prospects → qualified → meeting → proposal → won
Conversion rates calculated between each funnel stage
Channel attribution: which discovery source produces best clients (LinkedIn, referral, inbound, cold email)
ICP performance analysis: which ideal client profiles convert best
Outreach template leaderboard: best performing subject lines and sequences
Time-to-close analysis by deal size and client type
Monthly trends: pipeline growth, activity volume, win rate
Revenue attribution to specific prospecting activities
Exportable reports for quarterly business review

stories.title: Mobile-first prospect capture
stories.description: PWA optimized for quick prospect capture and touchpoint logging while networking or on the go
acceptance: Valid web app manifest with Prospect branding installable on iOS and Android
Quick-add prospect form: name, company, email, context note, photo of business card
Business card OCR extracts contact details automatically
Voice memo recording for meeting notes with transcription
Offline support caches recent data and queues new entries for sync
Push notifications for follow-up reminders
Home screen widget shows today's priority actions
QR code scanner imports vCard contact details
Minimal data entry with smart defaults and autocomplete
